room_title: Escape room "Escape from 20,000 Leagues" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: So much fun! Did the 20,000 leagues room with a group of four and we made it out right at the buzzer! Jillian and Chris were awesome! Gave us guidance without giving away the clues or telling us what to do. They knew that room forward and backward. We can't wait to do the other themed rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from 20,000 Leagues" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: Did the 20,000 Leagues one today and it was quite clever! Thoroughly enjoyed it. David was a great Game Master!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from 20,000 Leagues" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: What a fun and challenging experience! I just did the 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea with my 20-year-old son. We were paired up with 2 teenage girls. We learned how to work together as well as how to divide and conquer! We solved the puzzle and escaped with 46 seconds left!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from 20,000 Leagues" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: Puzzle Break Newton was awesome! My friends and I did the submarine themed room and escaped! It was super fun and our instructor Ariel was really great!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from 20,000 Leagues" by Puzzle Break in Boston
review: I had a great time at Puzzle Break! It was my first time and I escaped with a few minutes to spare with my friends. I was in the submarine room and our instructor Ariel was very nice and helpful! I would definitely go again!
